report.title: Jittery Borderline Cruise
report.author: Penguins 3rd Leg
report.bodytext: Smoked 4 pipes of fresh leaf, and one pipe of flowers/seeds. 5+minutes - feeling something, nervous jittery, the curtain is moving upward slowly and doging from side to side ever so slightly. Doubt this is a 'placebo' effect. /n /n 10+minutes - I feel a bit stoned, my fingers have slight, jittery trails as I am typing. /n /n 15+minutes - monitors refresh rate more noticable, appreciable connection to geometric/psychedelic patterns, pupils constricted /n /n p.s I am going to try some more, intruiging to say the least. /n /n /n - 5/30/2004
